laboratory_examinations.findings: >25 PMNs and >10 epithelial cells/100X field. Indicated extensive contamination with upper respiratory secretions.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Bacterial culture results are invalid; suggested submitting another specimen.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Liver shows normal echotexture, no focal lesions, portal venous flow is hepatopetal, CBD measures 3 mm, pancreas not well visualized, kidneys normal size with a 4mm hyperechoic focus in the left kidney likely representing a small angiomyolipoma, no free fluid in the abdomen.
